Package support

Class FileControl

java.lang.Object
support.FileControl
public class FileControl extends Object
The FileControl class provides methods to read and write files related to worker information

  • Method Details

    • writeToFile

      public void writeToFile(ArrayList<Worker> workers, String file) throws IOException, XMLStreamException
      Writes a list of workers to an XML file specified by the given path. The XML file will contain the name, coordinates, salary, position, status, and personal information (birthday, height, passportID, and location) of each worker.
      Parameters:
      workers - the list of workers to be written to the file
      file - the path of the file to be written
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing the file
      XMLStreamException - if an error occurs while writing the XML document

    • readXmlFile

      public List<Worker> readXmlFile()
      Reads worker information from an XML file and returns a list of workers
      Returns:
      a List of workers read from the XML file

    • checkFilePermissions

      public static void checkFilePermissions(String arg) throws IOException
      Checks the permissions of the file specified by the argument
      Parameters:
      arg - a string representing the file path to check the permissions of
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file does not exist or does not have the necessary permissions
